* Iron Raptor gasped as she heard the explosion inside of the Ark, she opens 
her com-link to Iris...*

" Slag! What's happened?"

IRIS: "An explosion on the main bridge! I'm working on it."

* Iris scans through the main files of the Ark but finds nothing of main 
use, she then goes through her own files...and a little something that might 
work came up. She scanned over it and checked off the things that she needed 
depending if the Ark had it available or not, most of what she needed was 
there but some of the key things that she required to pull it off.
Iris then began to scan for substitutes, there were some but not many, she 
downloaded what she could and began to work her magic.
It would take a little energy but she knew that it was passable now to 
achieve, if she was permitted to.
Iris automatically opened a channel to Liono's com-link...*

" Commander, I have located an auto-locater weapon in the roof of the ship, 
may I have permission to activate it? It's energy will let off and travel 
along the walls, it will then target and nutralize any and only Predacon 
signatures. Almost like a mega-shock wave but only the enemy will be 
effected. Do I have permission?"

* This may be their last line of defence but it was up to Liono to give the 
word, Iris waited patently.*
